meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an artisan.
meanings.sent1: The artisanal craftsmanship of the handmade pottery was evident in its intricate design.
meanings.sent2: The artisanal bread at the bakery was always a customer favorite.
meanings.sent3: The artisanal cheese whispered secrets of the farm where it was crafted.
meanings.sent4: Her artisanal approach to painting transformed the canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The artisanal jewelry sparkled with the care and skill of the maker.

meanings.definition: Made in a traditional or non-mechanized way.
meanings.sent1: The artisanal furniture was crafted by hand using traditional tools.
meanings.sent2: The artisanal soap was made with natural ingredients and no machinery.
meanings.sent3: The artisanal jam danced in the jar, celebrating its old-fashioned recipe.
meanings.sent4: His artisanal methods of brewing beer harkened back to simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The artisanal rug bore the marks of hand-weaving, a testament to its authenticity.

meanings.definition: A product made in a traditional or non-mechanized way.
meanings.sent1: The artisanal was a hit at the farmer's market, selling out quickly.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her artisanal creations at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The artisanal stood out on the shelf, surrounded by mass-produced items.
meanings.sent4: Customers lined up to purchase the artisanal from the local bakery.
meanings.sent5: The artisanal had a special charm that factory-made goods could never replicate.
